verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, I believe, help my unbelief.
Lord, I receive, help my eyes to see.
That You have power over death and darkness.
That You have power over death and darkness.
Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The faithless will be true, and the blind shall see.
The dumb shall speak to You, and their song shall say
That You have power over death and darkness
That You have power over death and darkness.
Lord I believe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The bitter will be clean. And the lame shall walk.
The hardened heart will bow
And the deaf will hear
That You have power over death and darkness.
That You have power over death and darkness.
Lord I believe.
